name: Mori Story Reboot Demo (Taiga Voyage)
description:
You are Moridachi Taiga, a cat boy who decided to help his old friend Frank find his necklace. The story brings you through the first island of the world, as you search for this necklace, fight different monsters, meet new friends, and more.
Uncover the mysteries of the past, and discover the strange group trying to obtain the necklace for themselves.

A note

Like the previous gameboy demo, this is a sort of prototype for a larger idea. This specific piece of software is probably not going to be getting any updates, unless someone points out something game breaking (Since I've never exported an RPG Maker MV project as a web file before, I don't know if there's anything I missed in particular).
